text: Ye Wanyong (, Hanja: , 7 June 1858 – 12 February 1926), also known as Yi Wanyong, was a politician, diplomat and writer of during the Korean Joseon dynasty. He was prime minister of the Korean Empire in 1896 and from 1907 to 1909. He signed the Japan–Korea Treaty of 1910. His penname was Ildang (일당, 一堂). == Book == * Ildangisa (일당기사, 一堂紀事) Category:1858 births Category:1926 deaths Category:Korean educators Category:Korean politicians Category:Korean autobiographers
title: Ye Wanyong
